DOC.brief_summary: Examine adhesive dermal tolerability EMSAm 6mg/24hr 12mg/24hr healthy elderly non-elderly subject .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study examine adhesion characteristic dermal tolerability ( irritation ) EMSAM two population consist non-elderly ( 18 - 64 year ) elderly ( 65 year old ) healthy volunteer . EMSAM dose range propose size market [ ( 6mg/24hr ) , ( 9mg/24hr ) , ( 12mg/24hr ) ] . Adhesion tolerability ( irritation ) examine three different application site area ( upper torso [ include chest back ] , upper arm , upper thigh ) . The secondary objective examine adhesion characteristic dermal tolerability ( irritation ) EMSAM may influence secondary factor gender , race , physical activity , bathing/showering practice .
DOC.criteria: To eligible study participation , subject meet follow criterion : Able willing provide write informed consent . Able willing follow modify diet . 18 year age old . Male female . If female childbearing potential , subject must negative pregnancy screen baseline may lactate . Females childbearing potential must demonstrate use acceptable form birth control , hormonal contraceptive , intrauterine device barrier method ( i.e . condom w/spermicide ) . NOTE : Abstinence partner vasectomy acceptable method contraception . In general good health ascertain physical examination , supine stand vital sign , laboratory test result , 12 lead ECG medical history . Any following condition exclude subject eligibility study participation : Subjects past present condition include follow : 1 . In opinion Investigator , significant cardiovascular disease disorder include myocardial infarction , cardiac arrhythmia , hypertension recurrent episodes orthostatic hypotension . 2 . Any skin abnormality near designate patch application site might interfere conduct interpretation study include presence mole , blemish , excess hair , scar , tattoo , sunburn mark application site may obscure grade site ( ) . 3 . Any known hypersensitivity , related hypersensitivity , selegiline skin adhesive ( i.e . surgical tape , etc. ) . 4 . Any significant immunological , pulmonary , hematologic , endocrine and/or metabolic disease disorder severe acute medical illness , , metastatic cancer , brain tumor , decompensated cardiac , hepatic renal failure . 5 . Neurological disorder include delirium , history significant head trauma , movement disorder , dementia , multiple sclerosis stroke . 6 . Any psychiatric disorder ( except personality disorder ) require treatment therapy within last three month . 7 . Any mood disorder include MDD current relapse past three year . 8 . Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder attention deficit disorder . 9 . Any condition , illness disorder opinion Investigator would place subject significant risk inability follow requirement study regard maintain schedule visit patch application . 10 . Known substance abuse addiction . 11 . Any significant allergy , especially involve dermal manifestation . 12 . History sun hypersensitivity photosensitive dermatosis . Recent current treatment systemic topical drug medication interfere skin response ( i.e . steroid , corticosteroid , antihistamine antiinflammatory agent ) . Daily regimen lowdose aspirin acceptable . Current anticipated use meperidine , tricyclic antidepressant , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( i.e. , fluoxetine [ Prozacïƒ’ ] , etc ) antidepressant medication ( e.g. , SNRI 's , MAOI 's , buproprion , etc ) .
